question: I have 12 days left and I'm dilated, lost bloody show, and contracting all week. taking my kids trick or treating soon and I'm so worried my water will break or my contractions will get stronger and start labor with the hours of walking ahead....anyone else ?
title: who is worried bout halloween babies ??
